name: Streen
description: A centralized WebSocket Twitch Chat interface

SECRET_KEY.description: A secret key, used as a pre-shared key to authenticate clients.

TWITCH_CLIENT_ID.description: A Twitch API ClientID, used for making some API calls.

TWITCH_USERNAME.description: The Twitch username of the account to connect to chat as.

TWITCH_PASSWORD.description: The password of the Twitch account to connect to chat as.

SLACK_BOT_TOKEN.description: (Optional) The token of a Slack bot, used to post status messages.

SLACK_STATUS_CHANNEL.description: (Optional) The Slack channel in which to post status updates.
